media:group.media:title: [VECTOR SPACES 2] N-Dimensional Vector Spaces
media:group.media:description:
N-Dimensional Vector Spaces: examples (RGB colors, polynomials), vector space axioms, vector subspaces.

King's College London Physics Program 
Year 1 Maths Video Lecture

CONTENTS:
- Example 1: RGB Colorspace [0:26]
- Example 2: Polynomials as vectors [3:54]
- Example 3: Videogame characters as vectors [6:16]
- What is a vector? [7:02]
- Introduction to axioms [9:14]
- Vector space axioms [9:58]
- Lines and planes as vector spaces [12:48]
- Vector subspaces [16:31]

Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño
Senior Lecturer King's College London
